---
title: "tolik_chem"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
 
#read in csv, change out "." for NA and then clean names to lower_snake 
toolik_biochem <- read.csv(here::here("data", "2011_Kling_Akchem.csv"), na = c(".","NA"))|>clean_names()

#filter down to pH, DOC, and TDN
inlet_biochem <- toolik_biochem |> dplyr::filter(site == "Toolik Inlet") |>  dplyr::select( p_h, doc_u_m, tdn_u_m) 
```

```{r}
for (i in inlet_biochem$p_h){
  p_h_mean <- sum(inlet_biochem$p_h[i])/i
  print(p_h_mean)
}

for (i in inlet_biochem$doc_u_m){
  doc_u_m_mean <- (sum(inlet_biochem$doc_u_m[i])/i, na.rm = TRUE)
  print(doc_u_m_mean)
}

```
